DOC.detailed_description: The SKOT II prospective cohort study include child obese mother body mass index 30 kg/m2 . These mother invite SKOT II participate randomise study Hvidovre Hospital , Copenhagen . The family invite three examination , child 9 , 18 36 month age . A total 184 child include 2010 . The examination collect data design way SKOT I , study healthy child bear non-obese mother . The examination take place Department Nutrition , Exercise Sports , Frederiksberg , Denmark . Following data collect examination : Anthropometry ( weight , height , age- sex specific Z score body composition , triceps- subscapularis skinfolds ) , background interview ( e.g . infant feeding , household income , parent 's educational level , allergy chronic disease ) , blood pressure ( systolic , diastolic mean arterial pressure ) , faeces- urine sample , blood sample ( 9 36 month age ) , bio impedance ( 36 month age ) , 4 day diet registration , general questionnaire ( e.g . sleep , daycare , attendance use screen device ) , psychomotor questionnaire ( motoric development ) 7 day physical activity monitoring ( 36 month age ) .
